headline: Ask HN: Forgot my Snapchat password and have a new number. What now?
description:
I have a ~4 year old snapchat account that I use to keep in touch with a lot of people. There are a lot of close friends that I only communicate with through that app and have no other way to contact.

The phone number I used to sign up with was discarded years ago and there doesn't appear to be any alternative way to reset my password (unless I had signed up with an email, which I didn't).

Am I just shit out of luck? I really, really, really don't want to lose those connections. A lot of them are people I was stationed overseas with while in the military.
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 忘记了我的Snapchat密码，有一个新号码。现在怎么办？
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 忘記了我的Snapchat密碼，有一個新號碼。現在怎麼辦？
description_zh-Hans:
我有一个~4年的snapchat账户，我用它来和很多人保持联系。

我用来注册的电话号码几年前就被丢弃了，而且似乎也没有任何其他方法来重置我的密码（除非我用电子邮件注册，但我没有）。我真的、真的、真的不想失去这些关系。他们中的很多人都是我在军队时驻扎在海外的人。
description_zh-Hant:
我有一個~4年的snapchat賬戶，我用它來和很多人保持聯繫。

我用來註冊的電話號碼幾年前就被丟棄了，而且似乎也沒有任何其他方法來重置我的密碼（除非我用電子郵件註冊，但我沒有）。我真的、真的、真的不想失去這些關係。他們中的很多人都是我在軍隊時駐紮在海外的人。
